plays.text: Goal scored by Petr Schastlivy assisted by Martin Havlat and Joel Kwiatkowski

Penalty to Anton Volchenkov 2 minutes for Hooking Geoff Sanderson
Penalty to Geoff Sanderson 2 minutes for Diving Anton Volchenkov
Goal scored by Marian Hossa assisted by Wade Redden
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for Crosschecking Todd White
Goal scored by Wade Redden assisted by Daniel Alfredsson and Anton Volchenkov
Goal scored by Marian Hossa assisted by Peter Schaefer
